long.en:
The note.com to Notion plugin allows you to effortlessly save content from note.com to Notion. 

Key features include:

ğŸ“‹ One-Click Save: Save articles to Notion with a single click.
ğŸ· Tag and Category Management: Add tags and categories to organize saved articles within Notion.
ğŸ”„ Auto Sync: Automatically sync updates from note.com to Notion.
âš™ï¸ Easy Installation: Quick and straightforward installation to start using immediately.
Efficiently manage valuable content from note.com with this plugin.
